participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and sociable, enjoys connecting with others through shared experiences.
participant_1.background: I enjoy exploring new parts of the city. I volunteer at the homeless shelter. I'm a piano teacher on the side. My father played violin professionally.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Active and nurturing, passionate about sports and caring for others.
participant_2.background: My family is continuously growing. I enjoy long walks with my dog. I'm a professional tennis player. I'm married to a doctor. I live in a three-storey house.

content.text: hi, I am a teacher. what do you do for a living? I work at a homeless shelter
do you have any hobbies? I like to volunteer on the homeless
Yupe.... To do waste time on smartphone
do you like to travel? I volunteer on a piano shelter. I like it
do you enjoy it? I do not have time for it. I like exploring
